titleStmt.title: A short account of the process and trial at the instance of His Majesty's advocate by special order of His Majesty's privy council against Thomas Frazer of Beaufort and Captain Simeon Frazer his son and their complices for the crimes of treason and other crimes contained in their inditement.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
